categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Backdraft" was the nickname of a male human TIE fighter pilot in the First Order. Backdraft served as a Special Forces pilot who flew one of the elite TIE/sf space superiority fighters. As a pilot of the First Order starfighter corps, Backdraft was equipped with the fighter pilot uniform, and was described as a fiery fanatic. At one point, Backdraft flew near a star in his fighter. He had light skin and black hair.
